newsitem.title: USA: Bloomberg, Desktop Data in news pact.
newsitem.headline: Bloomberg, Desktop Data in news pact.

text.p: Bloomberg LP said Wednesday it reached agreement with Desktop Data Inc to deliver Bloomberg news through Desktop Data's real-time network-based news management system NewsEDGE.

The alliance will allow customers of Open Bloomberg -- the personal computer and workstation-based version of the company's information service -- to receive stories through NewsEDGE's filtering and management system.
The news alliance is the first of its kind for Bloomberg, although the company has previously entered agreements for covering its data products, a spokeswoman said.
Desktop Data's NewsEDGE draws on content from more than 120 publishers, including newswires, newspapers and other sources.
